#  + Using staring cluster and merged node alignments generated by latest version of GeMMA (06-03-2018)
#  + For default gs_eval, using the 1st quartile Q1 (25% of the Evalues in trace) as the Evalue threshold for auto-merging and Q3 for Evalue relaxing during merging (2016)
#  + Added subroutine for listing the starting clusters for each of the generated FunFams
#  + Re-packaged the code and added documentation
#  + Added scripts to run in myriad. legion and bchuckle
